cvss2.cvss2_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1913

description: @Mail WebMail Client in AtMail Open-Source before 1.05 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an e-mail attachment with an executable extension, leading to the creation of an executable file under tmp/.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1916

description: compose.php in @Mail WebMail Client in AtMail Open-Source before 1.05 does not properly handle ../ (dot dot slash) sequences in the unique parameter, which allows remote attackers to conduct directory traversal attacks and read arbitrary files via a ..././ (dot dot dot slash dot slash) sequence.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1917

description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in (1) compose.php and (2) libs/Atmail/SendMsg.php in @Mail WebMail Client in AtMail Open-Source before 1.05 allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the Attachment[] parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1918

description: CRLF injection vulnerability in mime.php in @Mail WebMail Client in AtMail Open-Source before 1.05 allows remote attackers to conduct directory traversal attacks and read arbitrary files via a %0A sequence followed by a .. (dot dot) in the file parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1919

description: @Mail WebMail Client in AtMail Open-Source 1.04 and earlier allows remote attackers to obtain configuration information via a direct request to install/info.php, which calls the phpinfo function.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1920

description: Opera before 11.62 allows user-assisted remote attackers to trick users into downloading and executing arbitrary files via a small window for the download dialog.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1924

description: Opera before 11.62 does not ensure that a dialog window is placed on top of content windows, which makes it easier for user-assisted remote attackers to trick users into downloading and executing arbitrary files via a download dialog located under other windows.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1925

description: Opera before 11.62 allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via the (1) history.pushState and (2) history.replaceState functions in conjunction with cross-domain frames, leading to unintended read access to history.state information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1926

description: Opera before 11.62 allows remote attackers to spoof the address field by triggering the launch of a dialog window associated with a different domain.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1927

description: Opera before 11.62 allows remote attackers to spoof the address field by triggering a page reload followed by a redirect to a different domain.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1928

description: Opera before 11.62 on Mac OS X allows remote attackers to spoof the address field and security dialogs via crafted styling that causes page content to be displayed outside of the intended content area.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1929

description: Opera before 11.62 on UNIX uses world-readable permissions for temporary files during printing, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading these files.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1930

description: Opera before 11.62 on UNIX, when used in conjunction with an unspecified printing application, allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary file during printing.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1931

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in wiki/rankings.php in Bitweaver 2.7 and 2.8.1 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the style parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2010-5086

description: The implementation of Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) and PKCS #7 in OpenSSL before 0.9.8u and 1.x before 1.0.0h does not properly restrict certain oracle behavior, which makes it easier for context-dependent attackers to decrypt data via a Million Message Attack (MMA) adaptive chosen ciphertext attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-1312
